segments.text: This visit is over for me . Here's your room key .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for that , and in return , here's your receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you'll visit us again , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd be willing to try this hotel again , if you can promise me no more cockroaches .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guarantee you that our little “ friends ” won't be back . I hope your trip home is pleasant .
segments.speaker: S2
